we need to keep track of our collective knowledge
we need to create a community (beyond the program)
we need to archive the different stages of a research project, including all its audiovisual material, in order to preserve it
we need our researchers to be able to exchange knowledge
we need to provide appropriate work environment for researchers
we need to be able to provide an overview of the different outcomes (people + process)
we need to able to explain by example what we do and how we do it
we need to able to show what we do to accreditors
we need the research (in progress) to be presented in a way that it’s clear for external examiners
we need to have a calendar with events from the institute, researchers and the alumni
we need to be able to share the exam material with examiners
we need to be able to export (parts) of the platform
we need to be able to keep track of the progress
we need to be able to easily gather exam material
we need to have an overview of the submitted exam material
we need to make sure that exam material can’t be changed after it’s submitted so that it will never get lost
